name: Cheddar Pennies
author: Adrienne Anderson
summary: Delicious cheddar penny cookies!!! My mother and I have made these for years and they are just as good as when I was young.
directions: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Lightly grease a large cookie sheet
In a medium bowl, mix together the flour, salt and cayenne pepper
Stir in the Cheddar cheese and melted butter to form a firm dough
Roll pieces of dough into ropes as big around as a penny
If dough is too soft, it can be chilled until firm
Place slices onto the prepared cookie sheet so they are 1 inch apart
Bake for 20 to 25 minutes in the preheated oven, until the bottoms of the pennies are lightly toasted and the tops are firm
Allow to cool completely before serving
Store in an airtight container at room temperature
